name: tvruhh.zip
items: The Void Rains Upon Her Heart.sh

attr.title: The Void Rains Upon Her Heart
attr.desc: Help her heart battle tough bosses in this Boss Rush, Bullet-hell with rogue-like elements. Fight through several randomly chosen boss battles leading up to a final battle. Each defeated monster will give her random gifts that power up her heart. Don't let her heart break!
attr.inst: Install portfiles. Download this specific version of the game with the steam console: "download_depot 790060 790061 7858860086893173396". Copy all gamefiles to the gamedata folder.
attr.inst_md:
- Install portfiles.
- Download this specific version of the game with the steam console: "download_depot 790060 790061 7858860086893173396"
- Copy all gamefiles to the gamedata folder.
